CustomField.formula: If( VALUE( MID( TEXT( Session_Time__c ), 1, 2) ) > 12, TEXT(VALUE( MID( TEXT( Session_Time__c ), 1, 2) )-12)+""+MID( TEXT( Session_Time__c ), 3, 3)+" PM", TEXT(VALUE( MID( TEXT( Session_Time__c ), 1, 2) ) )+""+MID( TEXT( Session_Time__c ), 3, 3)+" AM" )
CustomField.label: Session Start Time
